# distrviz

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of distrviz is to vizualize (hopefully) every distribution that is 
available in the [`{distr6}`](https://github.com/xoopR/distr6) package. So far,
these distributions are available:

```{r echo=F}
distr6::listDistributions() |> 
  dplyr::as_tibble() |> 
  dplyr::select(Distribution = ClassName,
         Type = ValueSupport) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(Available = tolower(Distribution) %in% 
           c(
             "Normal distribution" = "normal",
             "Student distribution" = "studentt",
             "Beta distribution" = "beta",
             "Chi-Squared distribution" = "chisquared",
             "Arcsine distribution" = "arcsine"
           )
         ) |> 
  gt::gt()
```
